title: Olive
description: My life is falling apart.My life isn't my life anymore.I thought that I was Olivia. That Olivia is who I am. I thought that my parents are who they made me believe they were.I thought that my brother was my brother.I thought wrong.One piece of information, delivered to me was all it took to make my world crumble. One piece of information delivered by a stranger turned my world upside down and made me rethink my whole being. Another piece of information delivered to me by someone I was suppose to trust had my world spinning around, in another direction.This isn't a love story. This is a story about forbidden love. And where there is forbidden love there are dreadful consequences.
author: Veronica Short
